modules.description: Handles SMTP protocol operations including connecting, sending commands, and managing email transmission. Works with byte sequences, sockets, and SMTP-specific state machines. Used to build email clients or servers with TLS support or asynchronous I/O.

Provides functions to send emails via SMTP using either direct delivery (port 25) or submission (port 465 or 587), with options for TLS configuration, authentication, and custom encoders/decoders. Operates on types such as `Colombe.Reverse_path`, `Colombe.Forward_path.t list`, and `Colombe.Domain.t`. Enables sending emails with STARTTLS or direct TLS, supporting scenarios like email relaying through an authority or sending from a specific identity.
